title: Elvis Presley - That's The Way It Is (2CD Legacy 2014) [FLAC]
description:
Elvis: That's the Way It Is is the 40th album by Elvis Presley, released on RCA Records, LSP 4445, in November 1970. The 2014 Legacy release includes the original album plus single releases and outtakes. Also added is a previously unreleased show from Elvis' 1970 "Summer Season".
